attributes.action:
There is this station called Pilning
I would like to see more trains call there
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to sort out to have a more regular service to Pilning
They see two trains per week
On a Saturday and 
They only have 1 platform
Technically they have two but 
Because the footbridge was removed due to electric works there must be some sort of arrangement to have a 
Footbridge installed again 
And better facilities 
E.g better car parking 
Lights 
Better accessibility
This includes having lift
